meanings.sent1: She received a lovely koha from her friend.
meanings.sent2: The charity event collected many koha for those in need.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected koha made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a koha that brightened his day.
meanings.sent5: The koha symbolized gratitude and generosity.

meanings.definition: To give a gift or donation
meanings.sent1: They decided to koha some food to the local shelter.
meanings.sent2: He always kohas generously during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: She loves to koha handmade crafts to her friends.
meanings.sent4: The community came together to koha support to the family in need.
meanings.sent5: He kohas his time to help those less fortunate.

meanings.definition: A traditional Maori custom of gift-giving
meanings.sent1: The koha ceremony was a beautiful display of culture.
meanings.sent2: They exchanged koha as a sign of respect and friendship.
meanings.sent3: The playful koha exchange brought laughter to the gathering.
meanings.sent4: The koha tradition has been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent5: The koha ritual deepened the bond between the two families.
